com.github.mikephil.charting.jobs

Class MoveViewJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mikephil.charting.jobs.MoveViewJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MoveViewJob
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Runnable that is used for viewport modifications since they cannot be executed at any time. This can be used to delay the execution of viewport modifications until the onSizeChanged(...) method of the chartview is called.
